title: x/mobile/app: build is broken for darwin/arm64
body:
I am not sure about the stability of the darwin/arm64 port of the mobile packages but the build is broken.

```
CGO_ENABLED=1 GOARCH=arm64 go build golang.org/x/mobile/example/basic
# golang.org/x/mobile/app
../../app/darwin_armx.go:134: sync is not a package
../../app/darwin_armx.go:134: undefined: Mutex
```
